target: Chill 30 minutes or until firm enough to handle.

input: In an 8-inch skillet, preferable cast-iron, cook bacon over moderate heat until crisp and transfer to paper towels to drain.,Pour off excess fat from skillet.,Crumble bacon and reserve.,In skillet cook garlic in 1 tablespoon butter over moderately low heat, stirring, until softened.,Add mushrooms and salt and pepper to taste and cook over moderate heat, stirring, until liquid from mushrooms starts to evaporate.,Add Cognac or other brandy and boil until nearly evaporated.,______,Transfer sauce to a small saucepan and stir in reserved bacon and parsley.,Keep sauce warm.,Pat filets mignons dry with paper towels and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.,In skillet heat remaining 1/2 tablespoon butter over moderately high heat until foam begins to subside and saute filets mignons 4 minutes.,Sear sides slightly and turn filets over.,Saute 3 to 3 1/2 minutes more for medium-rare meat.,Divide filets between 2 plates and spoon sauce over them.
target: Stir in water, lemon juice, and Worcestershire sauce and boil until sauce is thickened slightly.

input: In a large bowl combine 1/2 cup of butter and the cream cheese, and let come to room temperature.,______,Chill.,Roll out half of the dough and place in a 9-inch pie pan.,In a saucepan combine the remaining ingredients and bring to a boil.,Pour the mixture into the crust.,Roll out the remaining crust and place over the filling.,Cut slits in the top crust and allow steam to escape.,Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.,Serve with ice cream, if desired.
target: Add 2 cups of flour and blend well.

input: Toss veggies together in a bowl.,Combine mayonnaise, milk, sugar, salt, pepper and celery seed.,Mix until smooth.,Pour over vegetables and toss to coat.,______
target: Chill before serving.

input: Follow the instructions on the back of you cake mix bake for preheating your oven.,______,Add all cake ingredients in a large bowl and mix with a hand mixer on low speed for 30 seconds and high speed for an additional 2 minutes.,Pour batter into a prepared pan.,Bake according to the directions on the back of the box and cake will be done when a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean.,Let the cake sit for 10 minutes in the pan and then remove to a cooling rack.,In another large bowl, mix all glaze ingredients together. If you want your glaze a little more liquidly add water a teaspoon at a time until you are happy with the consistency.,While the cake is still slightly warm, place wax paper or paper towels under the cooling rack and drizzle the glaze on to the cake making sure the sides get a little drizzle as well.
target: Grease and flour a your choice of pan- I personally like to use a bunt pan.

input: ______,Melt chocolate mixture and set aside.,Sift flour with salt and soda. Beat eggs and add sugar, sour cream and vanilla.,Add flour mixture to egg mixture alternately with chocolate mixture.,Mix only until flour is blended.,Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes, using 9-inch greased pans.
target: Put water, oil and chocolate in top of double boiler.

input: Preheat oven to 350F.,______,Line pan bottom with circle of parchment paper.,Whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt in bowl.,Whisk together oil, wine, orange juice, and orange and lemon zests in separate bowl.,Beat eggs and sugar with electric mixer 4 minutes, or until pale yellow and tripled in volume.,Add half of dry ingredients, and mix on low speed until blended.,Add half of olive oil mixture, and mix to blend.,Repeat with remaining dry ingredients and olive oil mixture.,Pour batter into prepared pan, and set on baking sheet.,Bake 50 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.,Cool 10 minutes, then remove sides of pan to cool completely.,Dust with confectioners sugar, and serve with berries.
target: Coat 9- x 3-inch springform pan lightly with oil.

input: Sift Together:,2cups flour or cake flour with 2 cups sugar,(set aside for later).,Mix in a saucepan and bring to a boil,2 Sticks Margarine or butter, 3 TBLS Cocoa, and 1 cup coke.,Pour this over the dry ingredients you sat aside. and mix in:,1/2cup buttermilk w/1TSP soda; 2 well beaten eggs; 1 TSPS vanilla; 1 1/2cups minature marshmallows.,Bake 350 for 30 minutes.,When the cake is half done begin making the,icing.,Mix:,1/2cup Butter or Margarine; 6 TBLS Coke; 3 TBLS Cocoa.,Bring to a boil and slowly add the box of powdered sugar (and if you like 1 cup nuts).,______
target: Once Icing is mixed well and cake is done pour the hot icing over the hot cake.

input: Mix cookie crumbs with melted margarine; spoon into a 9 x 13-inch pan and freeze.,Spread ice cream on crumbs and re-freeze. Bring to a boil the sugar, milk, vanilla, semi-sweet chocolate and margarine.,Boil for 1 minute (stirring constantly).,Cool. Set aside 1/4 cup of chocolate sauce.,Spread remainder of sauce over the ice cream layer and re-freeze.,______,Sprinkle with nuts.,Dribble the 1/4 cup chocolate sauce (which was set aside) over top.,Re-freeze.,May need to slightly thaw before cutting to serve.
target: Spread Cool Whip over chocolate layer.

input: In a large bowl, tear up cake.,Mix in Cool Whip and prepared pudding to coat cake.,Pour into a 9 x 11-inch cake pan and smooth. Top with cherries.,______
target: Refrigerate until ready to serve.

input: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.,In a large saucepan, combine turkey, carrots, celery, onion, bay leaves, and thyme.,______,Bring to a boil.,Reduce heat to medium and simmer 5 minutes, until liquid reduces slightly.,Remove bay leaves.,Remove from heat and stir in peas.,Transfer turkey mixture to a deep-dish pie plate or shallow casserole dish placed on a baking sheet.,Spoon mashed potatoes over top and, using the back of a spoon, make an even layer.,Place pie on a baking sheet and bake 15 minutes, until top is golden brown and filling is bubbly.,Serving suggestion: Serve the pie with a bagged green salad.
target: Pour over chicken broth and set pan over high heat.

input: Preheat oven to 350 degrees.,Boil whole chicken, pick off all meat from the bones, and shred it.,Dice entire jar of dill pickles chips into small pieces.,Slice all olives in half once each.,______,Grease two 13x9 inch baking pans.,Heat half of the tortillas for 20 seconds in microwave to warm them.,Fill each tortilla with mixture, roll, and place into greased pans touching one another.,Repeat with other half of tortillas until all mix or tortillas are gone.,Pour sauce over all enchiladas in both pans.,Sprinkle remaining cheese over top.,Place in oven approximately 30 minutes or until cheese is melted and echiladas are thoroughly heated.,Serve with rice and beans and enjoy!
target: Combine 2 packages of cheese, all olives, all diced pickles, and all of the shredded chicken in a large bowl and mix together well.

input: snow egg whites with sugar, mix in vanilla, oil, orange juice, baking powder and flour.,bake in two round pans on 350 for 15-20 minutes - be careful not to over-bake!,to make topping:.,cut the strawberries into tiny pieces and whip together with rich's whip and powdered sugar.,Chill frosting while cake cools.,Frost cake.,You may keep the cake refrigerated.,______
target: You can decorate the top of cake with fresh strawberries, or serve by the slice with strawberries on the side.

input: Place pepperoni slices on a paper towel which is on a plate.,Place cheese on top of the slices (its ok to add as much as you want).,______,After that let them cool for about 1min then enjoy!
target: Put the plate in the microwave for about 23 seconds

input: Mix dry ingredients.,Add in melted copha and mix well.,______,Portion diets - negligible for 1 only Calories - 75 each (315KJ)
target: Divide into 24 patty pan papers.

input: In a mixer, cream together the butter and the sugar until light and fluffy.,Scrape down the sides of the bowl with a rubber spatula, then beat the egg.,Cream until the mixture is light and lemon-colored.,Add the molasses and mix until combined.,Scrape down the side of the bowl.,In a separate bowl, stir together the salt, ginger, cinnamon, and baking soda.,Add this to the butter mixture and mix until combined.,______,Wrap in plastic and chill at least 2 hours or overnight.,Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and lightly grease two baking sheets.,Roll the dough into balls 1/2 to 2 inches in diameter (depending on what size you like them) and arrange them in well-spaced rows on the cookie sheets.,Bake about 10-12 minutes, just until crisp.,The cookies will be thin and flat.,Let cool on the baking sheet 2 minutes, then transfer to wire racks.,When cool, store in an airtight container.
target: A third at a time, add the flour to the butter mixture and mix just until combined.

input: Heat the cream cheese in the microwave for 20-30 seconds until softened.,Add the yogurt and (strained) tofu and mix well.,After soaking the gelatin in water, microwave for 20 seconds and add to the cream cheese mixture.,Put the biscuits in a sealed plastic bag and use a rolling pin to crush them.,______,Put the mixture into the cake pan, cover with plastic wrap, and use the bottom of a cup to press the butter and biscuits into a crust.,Remove the plastic wrap and pour the cream cheese mixture from Step 2 into the crust.,Let rest in the refrigerator to finish!,This is the plain version, but if you add fruit sauce or top with jam, it's delicious!
target: Cut the butter while it's still firm, then fold the pieces into the crushed biscuits to mix together.

input: Cook Spaghetti.,______,drain grease.,In another pot, mix together soup, water (to desired consistency), pepper and oregano and heat on medium-low.,Add ground beef.,Serve over noodles and top with grated cheese.
target: Brown ground beef.

input: In a glass or stainless-steel container, combine the sole, lemon juice, and 1/2 teaspoon of the salt.,Let marinate at least 10 minutes.,In a blender, puree the garlic and ginger with the coconut milk, coriander, cumin, brown sugar, black pepper, turmeric, and cayenne.,In a large saucepan, heat the oil over moderate heat.,______,Add the tomato and cook, stirring occasionally, until soft, about 5 minutes.,Add the coconut mixture, the jalapenos, the water, and the remaining 3/4 teaspoon salt and bring slowly almost to a simmer, stirring frequently.,Add the fish and 1 tablespoon of the marinade.,Bring to a simmer and continue simmering until the fish is just done, 1 to 2 minutes.
target: Add the onion; cook, stirring occasionally, until golden, about 5 minutes.

input: Peel and core apples; cut into fourths, Unroll and separate crescent rolls, Wrap each piece of apple in one crescent roll,______, Sprinkle with cinnamon, Combine margarine, sugar and orange juice in saucepan; bring to a boil and remove from heat, Stir in vanilla, Pour over rolls; bake at 350° for 30 minutes, Spoon pan juice over rolls when serving,
target: Place in 8-inch square baking dish

input: Place peppers, chili and tomatoes cut side down on baking sheet with garlic cloves.,Broil until skins of peppers and tomatoes are charred and garlic cloves are softened.,Remove vegetables as they are ready.,Cool slightly, then skin and seed all vegetables.,Dice peppers and place in bowl.,Puree tomatoes, chili, garlic, coriander, caraway seeds and cinnamon in food processor.,Stir in lemon juice and olive oil.,______,Toss grilled peppers with tomato dressing.,Garnish with capers.
target: Season well with salt and pepper.

input: Pat dry the steaks and press the pepper evenly all around the steak. Season generously with salt and press it down with the pepper on the steak.,,Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a 12' heavy skillet over medium to high heat until hot but not smoking.,,Cook the steak to desire doneness, turning once. Transfer steaks to a plate. Pour off all fat from skillet and add the vinegar to the skillet to deglaze by boiling and scraping up any brown bits. Reduce to about 1/4 cup.,,Remove from the heat and whisk in the remaining 2 tablespoons butter until melted.,,______
target: Lightly season the sauce with salt and drizzle over the steaks
